overview: Raj Chowdhury is an entrepreneur and founder of renewable and internet companies. Presently he is the CEO of Unification Energy, a manufacturer of electric vehicle charging infrastructure; CEO of ShopABlock, shopping website with products from over 8000 merchants. He is a board member of Smartbid, an internet company offering pay per bid strategy auctions. Earlier he had been the founder of Power Enhancing Devices, a company manufacturing piezoelectric NEMS applications to harness environmental energy for portable electronic devices. Locus International was one of the companies he founded to create mapping data for global positioning systems. Raj started his career working for fortune 500 semiconductor companies in the Bay area. He has worked as a research associate at MITâ€™s Microsystems Technology Lab. He went to Tufts University, Santa Clara University and the Fletcher School of International Law and Diplomacy for his MS, MBA and certificate programs.
